skills.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
skills.blurb: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Shyvana''' deals 20% '''bonus''' {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to  {{ui|Dragon|Dragons}}.

Additionally, '''Shyvana''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|5 '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|5 '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, which is increased by 5 for every [[Dragon|elemental drake]] ({{ui|Cloud Drake}}, {{ui|Infernal Drake}}, {{ui|Mountain Drake}}, and {{ui|Ocean Drake}}) and {{ui|Elder Dragon}} her team slays.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Shyvana deals 20% bonus physical damage and magic damage to Dragons.
Additionally, Shyvana gains 5 bonus armor and 5 bonus magic resistance, which is increased by 5 for every Dragon (Cloud Drake, Infernal Drake, Mountain Drake, and Ocean Drake) and Elder Dragon her team slays.

skills.name: Twin Bite
skills.blurb: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds. Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds deals {{as|100% AD}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} and causes her to strike again after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
The second strike applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
'''Shyvana's''' basic attacks reduce ''Twin Bite's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{fd|0.5}} seconds {{tip|on-hit}}.
''Twin Bite'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Shyvana's''' basic attack timer.

{{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}:}} '''Shyvana''' instantly attacks all enemies in a cone around the target before applying ''Twin Bite's'' effects to each of them. The basic attacks deal {{as|100% AD}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}}, are affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers, and apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects to each target hit. The second strike cannot {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} nor trigger {{tip|on-attack}} effects, but it will still apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects. Additionally, ''Twin Bite's'' empowered attack has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Shyvana's next basic attack within 6 seconds deals 100% AD (+ 25% AP) and causes her to strike again after 0.25 seconds, dealing bonus physical damage.
The second strike applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Shyvana's basic attacks reduce Twin Bite's cooldown by 0.5 seconds on-hit.
Twin Bite resets Shyvana's basic attack timer.
Shyvana's Dragon Form: Shyvana instantly attacks all enemies in a cone around the target before applying Twin Bite's effects to each of them. The basic attacks deal 100% AD (+ 25% AP) physical damage, are affected by critical strike modifiers, and apply on-hit effects to each target hit. The second strike cannot critically strike nor trigger on-attack effects, but it will still apply on-hit effects. Additionally, Twin Bite's empowered attack has an uncancelable windup.
skills.notes:
*''Dragon Form's'' ''Twin Bite'' cannot apply {{iis|Tiamat}} {{nie|Cleave}} on each target hit because of {{nies|Cleave}} internal {{fd|0.05}} seconds interval during which it cannot be applied on a different target.
* Both strikes belong to the same {{tip|cast instance}}.
* Since the second strike applies after the ability goes on cooldown, it will reduce its own cooldown.
* Unlike most [[on-hit]] effects, the one reducing the cooldown of ''Twin Bite'' also triggers against {{tip|turret|structures}}.
* In ''Dragon Form'', ''Twin Bite'' consumes an additional stack of {{ri|Hail of Blades}}. {{bug}}

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: % AD (+ 15% AP)

skills.name: Burnout
skills.effect_radius: {{tt|162.5|Human form range}} / {{tt|{{ap|350|365|380}}|Dragon form range, scales with Dragon's Descent}}
skills.blurb: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' surrounds herself in flames for 3 seconds, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, decaying linearly over the duration, and dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to nearby enemies for the duration.

While ''Burnout'' is active, '''Shyvana's''' basic attacks deal {{as|magic damage}} equal to 25% of ''Burnout's'' per-tick damage to all nearby enemies and extend the duration of ''Burnout'' by 1 second. The duration extension may only occur up to 4 times.
{{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}:}} ''Burnout'' has increased effect radius, scaling with {{ais|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}} rank.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Shyvana surrounds herself in flames for 3 seconds, gaining bonus movement speed, decaying linearly over the duration, and dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies for the duration.
While Burnout is active, Shyvana's basic attacks deal magic damage equal to 25% of Burnout's per-tick damage to all nearby enemies and extend the duration of Burnout by 1 second. The duration extension may only occur up to 4 times.
Shyvana's Dragon Form: Burnout has increased effect radius, scaling with Shyvana's Dragon's Descent rank.
skills.notes: * {{Pending for test}}: {{as|Magic damage}} on-hit's interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

effects.str:
• Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 8% per 100 AP)
  • Bonus Movement Speed Decay: %
  • Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 20% bonus AD)

skills.name: Flame Breath
skills.blurb: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage {{tip|on-hit}}. Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' unleashes a fireball in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} and deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within its path and marks them for 5 seconds.

'''Shyvana's''' basic attacks against marked enemies deal {{as|{{fd|3.75}}% of the target's {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}, capped at 150 against monsters.

{{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}:}} ''Flame Breath'' explodes upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the target location, dealing increased {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area and scorching it for 4 seconds. Enemies within the scorched area are dealt {{pp|30 to 60 for 13|6 to 18|formula=30 + 2.5 per level|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 5% AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Shyvana unleashes a fireball in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion and deals magic damage to all enemies within its path and marks them for 5 seconds.
Shyvana's basic attacks against marked enemies deal 3.75% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage on-hit, capped at 150 against monsters.
Shyvana's Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the target location, dealing increased magic damage to all enemies within the area and scorching it for 4 seconds. Enemies within the scorched area are dealt 6 to 18 ‒ undefined (+ 5% AD) (+ 10% AP) magic damage every 0.5 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Empowered Magic Damage|{{pp|100 to 160 for 13|6 to 18|formula= 100+5 per level}} +
{{ap|60 to 220}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* The fireball applies {{tip|area damage}} and the [[on-hit]] effect against marked targets deals {{tip|proc damage}}.
** In ''Dragon Form'', the fiery explosion applies {{tip|area damage}} and the burning scorch deals {{tip|persistent area damage}} to all enemies within the area of effect.
* In ''Dragon Form'', both areas of effect will be centered on the first champion struck, not at the location the missile collided with them.
* ''Flame Breath'' will cast from wherever '''Shyvana''' is at the end of the cast time.
* {{Pending for test}}: {{as|Magic damage}} on-hit's interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 30% AD) (+ 70% AP)

• Empowered Magic Damage: 6 to 18 ‒ undefined +
    (+ 60% AD) (+ 100% AP)

(+ 60% AD) (+ 100% AP)

skills.name: Dragon's Descent
skills.blurb: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location. Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Fury:}} ''Dragon's Descent'' requires {{tip|Fury|{{as|100 Fury}}}} to be cast. '''Shyvana''' generates {{as|Fury}} per second while alive and in human form and {{as|2 Fury}} per basic attack {{tip|on-hit}} in either form. '''Shyvana''' gains {{as|100 Fury}} upon learning ''Dragon's Descent''.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' transforms into a ferocious dragon, {{tip|dash|dashing}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} to the target location and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies she passes through and {{tip|airborne|carrying}} them alongside her.

While in {{as|Dragon Form|buzzword3}}, '''Shyvana''' gains {{sti|health|{{as|'''bonus''' health}}}}, {{sti|range|'''bonus''' attack range}}, increased [[size]] and empowered [[Champion ability|abilities]]. She maintains {{as|Dragon Form|buzzword3}} at a recurring cost of {{as|Fury}}, returning to {{as|Human Form|buzzword3}} once all {{as|Fury}} has been depleted.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Fury: Dragon's Descent requires 100 Fury to be cast. Shyvana generates Fury per second while alive and in human form and 2 Fury per basic attack on-hit in either form. Shyvana gains 100 Fury upon learning Dragon's Descent.
Active: Shyvana transforms into a ferocious dragon, dashing with displacement immunity to the target location and dealing magic damage to all enemies she passes through and carrying them alongside her.
While in Dragon Form, Shyvana gains bonus health, bonus attack range, increased size and empowered Champion ability. She maintains Dragon Form at a recurring cost of Fury, returning to Human Form once all Fury has been depleted.
skills.notes:
* ''Dragon Descent's'' {{tip|displacement immunity}} begins from the start of the cast time.
* ''Dragon's Descent'' has a {{ap|100/(1 to 2)|round=2}} seconds effective cooldown when not attacking.
* {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace}} grants {{pp|key=%|type=stacks|10 to 10*5 for 4}} increased {{tip|Fury}} generation, for an effective cooldown when non attacking of:
** {{ap|100/((1 to 2)*1.1)|round=2}} with 1 {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|icononly=true}} stack.
** {{ap|100/((1 to 2)*1.2333)|round=2}} with 2 {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|icononly=true}} stacks.
** {{ap|100/((1 to 2)*1.3666)|round=2}} with 3 {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|icononly=true}} stacks.
** {{ap|100/((1 to 2)*1.5)|round=2}} with 4 {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|icononly=true}} stacks.
* ''Dragon's Descent'' has a {{ap|100/5}} seconds effective duration when not attacking, but can last indefinitely when attacking continuously with {{as|{{ap|2.5/2*2}} ({{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|{{ap|2.5/(2*(1.1 to 1.5))*2 4|round=2}}}}) attack speed|as}} (without counting {{ai|Q|Shyvana}}) or {{as|{{ap|2.5/(2*4/3)*2}} ({{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|{{ap|2.5/(2*(1.1 to 1.5)*4/3)*2 4|round=2}}}}) attack speed|as}} with {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.
